name: Golden Tee '99
overview:
Peter Jacobsen’s Golden Tee ‘99 is a direct followup to Peter Jacobsen's Golden Tee '98 and is based on the same engine as Golden Tee 3D Golf.
The game offers three new courses, Aspen Lake, Coconut Cove and Rancho Saguaro. As previously a trackball is used to swing the club and hit the ball.
